name: METHODS OR REFERENCE: Setout for Roundabout and Apron as per the drawings issued for construction
METHODS OR REFERENCE: Type 2B Mountable Kerb as per TDM Technical Standards - KC0001
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Kerb to be laid using precast hand-laid directly on polythene sheet on concrete subbase. Laid 100mm high from finish level of apron. Concrete 20MPa @28 Days
RECORDS: Clegg Sheet, photos. Concrete Plant Docket
METHODS OR REFERENCE: As per Drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 180mm depth of 20MPa broom finish reinforced(1 row of 663 Mesh with 60mm cover) Concrete with 6 kg/m3 Red oxide.
○ Expansion saw cut to be done by using concrete tool or using concrete saw on the following shift.
RECORDS: FH concrete QA sheet. Concrete delivery Dockets kept as record
METHODS OR REFERENCE: As per Drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 205mm thick 40MPa Concrete, reinforced with 25kg/m3 Dramix 4D6560BG steel fibre. 4kg/m3 Black oxide-Broom finish,on 0.25mm polythene layer, on concrete subbase

○ Expansion saw cut to be done by using concrete tool or using concrete saw 24 hours after the pour, 50mm deep. Saw-cut spacing/pattern to be as per Eliga Design Drawings. (5m spacing outer circle, 3m spacing inner circle)
RECORDS: FH concrete QA sheet. Concrete delivery Dockets kept as record
